content.question: The Constitution provides that judges shall hold their offices during good behavior for lifetime terms. Take a position on whether judges should have lifetime or fixed terms. Use at least one piece of evidence from one of the following foundational documents: Articles of Confederation The Federalist 51 Tenth Amendment In your response you should do the following: ✓ Respond to the prompt with a defensible claim or thesis that establishes a line of reasoning. ✓ Support your claim with at least TWO pieces of specific and relevant evidence. • One piece of evidence must come from one of the foundational documents listed above • A second piece of evidence can come from any other foundational document not used as your first piece of evidence, or it may come from your knowledge of course concepts. ✓ Use reasoning to explain why your evidence supports your claim or thesis.
